name: Masochism
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then 
   if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then 
      ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("masochism") 
   else
      affstrack.score.masochism = 100
      ak.scoreup(matches[2])
   end
end
matches: ^([\w'\-]+) drives a clenched fist into [\w'\-]+ gut\.$
^([\w'\-]+) uses [\w'\-]+ right foot to stomp on [\w'\-]+ left as hard as possible\.$
^([\w'\-]+) smiles as [\w'\-]+ rams [\w'\-]+ fist into [\w'\-]+ jaw\.$
^With the heel of [\w'\-]+ palm\, ([\w'\-]+) smacks [\w'\-]+ upside the head\.$
^([\w'\-]+) uses [\w'\-]+ [\w'\-]+ foot to stomp on [\w'\-]+ [\w'\-]+ as hard as possible\.$
